thread.title: Gemma Collins wears sexy LBD on TOWIE night out after fans accuse her of 'faking' weight loss photos - Mirror Online
thread.title_full: Gemma Collins wears sexy LBD on TOWIE night out after fans accuse her of 'faking' weight loss photos - Mirror Online

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Gemma Collins wears sexy LBD on TOWIE night out after fans accuse her of 'faking' weight loss photos - Mirror Online
text:
Gemma Collins wears sexy LBD on TOWIE night out after fans accuse her of 'faking' weight loss photos The reality star and her Essex castmates were all spotted out in north London for filming Share Gemma and the TOWIE cast film in London (Photo: Splash) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Gemma Collins made sure she was dressed to impress for a TOWIE night out on Tuesday. 
The reality star joined her castmates for a meal at Shaka Zulu bar and restaurant in Camden Town, north London. 
The 36-year-old star was proudly showing off her slimmed-down figure in a sexy LBD and grey over the knee lace-up boots. 
She finished off the look with a fitted black jacket draped over her shoulders and quilted handbag. Gemma enjoys a night out with the TOWIE crew (Photo: Splash News) The reality star was dressed to impress (Photo: Splash News) 
Her outing comes after she recently shared a string of social media shots showing off her impressive weight loss. 
However, one picture in particular came under fire from fans who accused her of altering it. 
Some fans think the picture - which shows her dressed in ripped trousers and a green shirt - had been changed, with some commenting saying it was "really bad Photoshop". Read More This is the picture that came under fire (Photo: Instagram) Gemma Collins (Photo: Instagram) 
One said: "Look at the curved floor tiles… edited! Instagram is so fake." 
Whille @jpmoney57 said: "The wobly f***ing floor. Why f***ing lie to people about loosing (sic) weight." 
The comments relate to Gemma's legs looking as if they've been adjusted. Fans pointed out the floor the white tiles seem to bend slightly, with the wall looking like it's tilting. Read More Gemma Collins answers door makeup-free revealing her REAL look after fans claimed she 'faked' weight loss snaps Gemma Collins (Photo: Instagram) 
Ever since Gemma joined The Only Way Is Essex she has openly talked about struggling with her weight and shared the various diets and exercise regimes she’s tried over the years. 
She recently appeared on ITV's Sugar Free Farm and back in 2015 she lost three stone in four weeks after signing up for a juice retreat run by Juice Master Jason Vale. 
Gemma has revealed before she gets offers from agents based on whether she'd "gain and lose" weight. Like us on Facebook
